branchCategory.name: CKZ2N
branchCategory.description: <p>Power clamp cylinder series CKZ2N conforms to the new NAAMS standard.  The rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion, reduce weld spatter accumulation.  The arm opening angle can be easily changed by replacing the stopper bolt.  The CKZ2N is available in sizes equivalent to 50, 63, and 80mm bore with arm opening angles ranging from 15<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">° to 135</span> <span style="color: #ff0000;"><strong>Consult your SMC Representative before use for program quantities.</strong></span></p>

branchItem.name: CKZ2N50, Steel Body NAAMS Power Clamp Cylinder, 50 Bore
branchItem.description: SMC's CKZ2N power clamp cylinder conforms to the new NAAMS standard. The rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion, reduce weld spatter accumulation. The arm opening angle can be easily changed by replacing the stopper bolt.  The CKZ2N is available in sizes equivalent to 50, 63 and 80mm bore with arm opening angles ranging from 15°to 135°.

branchItem.name: CKZ2N50, Power Clamp Cylinder Arm, 50 Bore
CKZ2N63, Steel Body NAAMS Power Clamp Cylinder, 63 Bore
branchItem.description: SMC's CKZ2N power clamp cylinder conforms to the new NAAMS standard. The rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion, reduce weld spatter accumulation. The arm opening angle can be easily changed by replacing the stopper bolt.  The CKZ2N is available in sizes equivalent to 50, 63 and 80mm bore with arm opening angles ranging from 15°to 135°.

branchItem.name: CKZ2N63, Power Clamp Cylinder Arm, 63 Bore
CKZ2N80, Steel Body NAAMS Power Clamp Cylinder, 80 Bore
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's CKZ2N power clamp cylinder conforms to the new NAAMS standard. The rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion, reduce weld spatter accumulation. The arm opening angle can be easily changed by replacing the stopper bolt.  The 80 bore CKZ2N is available with arm opening angles ranging from 15° to 135°.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZ2N80, Power Clamp Cylinder Arm, 80 Bore
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's CKZ2N 80 bore power clamp arm in a variety of NAAMS standard designs.  Painted arm is also an available option.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZN50/63, Power Clamp Cylinder Arm, X6013
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's CKZ2N/CKZ3N NAAMS standard power clamp cylinder arm. </p>
